definition: to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Blush can be poured through a hidden semi-transparent cover, very fitting skin.
sentences.chinese: 腮红可透过隐藏的半透明罩倒出，极度贴合肌肤。

sentences.english: The escaped prisoner was dragged from his hiding-place.
sentences.chinese: 那逃犯从他隐藏的地方被拖了出来。

sentences.english: God is revealed in the hiddenness of the external form.
sentences.chinese: 神的启示隐藏于外在的形体中。

sentences.english: How did the second AGN remain hidden for so long?
sentences.chinese: 第二个活动星系核是如何保持隐藏了这么久？

sentences.english: But those hopes were dashed after North Korea was caught hiding its nuclear program.
sentences.chinese: 但在朝鲜被发现隐藏核计划后，那些希望就化为泡影。

sentences.english: Many of the acolytes have been in hiding amongst the populace.
sentences.chinese: 许多寺僧都隐藏在平民当中。

sentences.english: Where is the best point to add the code that prohibits access to hidden pages for non-admins?
sentences.chinese: 怎么样才能更好地把阻止进入隐藏页面的代码加上？

sentences.english: I always have the feeling that something was avoided or hidden.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得某些事情被回避或隐藏了。

sentences.english: Want to hide yourself up, term who also cannot find, including myself.
sentences.chinese: 想把自己隐藏起来，任谁也找不到，包括自己。

sentences.english: Hide the texture layer and select the retouching one.
sentences.chinese: 隐藏的纹理层，并选择一个修饰。

sentences.english: If not, what do you hide from them, and why?
sentences.chinese: 如果不，那你隐藏了什么呢？

sentences.english: Content that is hidden to the user is not removed from the page, but is obscured.
sentences.chinese: 对用户隐藏的信息并没有从页面上除去，而是隐藏了。

sentences.english: Content that is hidden to the user is not removed from the page, but is obscured.
sentences.chinese: 对用户隐藏的信息并没有从页面上除去，而是隐藏了。
从不隐藏微单元框体窗口。

sentences.english: This paper presents a novel steganographic method in Discrete Cosine Transform(DCT) domain.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种在图像DCT域内的信息隐藏方法。

sentences.english: In fact, the pattern contains the seeds of more than just hiding remoteness.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，该模式的作用远不止隐藏远程性。

definition: hidden beneath the surface/buried and concealed
to expose/to reveal/to lay bare/also pr. [pu4 lu4]
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge
to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
